article_title: 'Extreme' Republicans Have Nothing On Their 'Moderate' Democrat Opposites

article_metadata.description: In our upside down world, it's now 'extreme' to be skeptical about the fallible individuals who presume to govern.
article_metadata.author: John Tamny
